content: @jenlampton We need to get a newsletter out ASAP. Let's check in tomorrow at meetings about the status of Newsletter account and how to move forward on that task.

Sounds good. I set something up with sendinblue last week that I think will
work.
@jenlampton is pretty busy right now. Is anyone else available to review a newsletter, before I send it out?
So far, I've gotten feedback from @BWPanda
OK, it appears on the free plan, we only get 300 emails per day. So, I'm sending to 300 of 2200 right now. Until we figure out if we just send 300 each day OR upgrade.
Our campaign is "Pending Validation." I'm not sure what that means.
Ugh.
Is that on Sendinblue?
yes
I was under the impression that we'd be able to do something like one free mailing per month to our entire list and then only have to pay if we did additional mailings. But, I may have misunderstood.

Maybe it's one of these:

  • https://help.sendinblue.com/hc/en-us/articles/209463245-How-can-I-get-my-SendinBlue-SMTP-account-activated-
  • https://help.sendinblue.com/hc/en-us/articles/209408165-Why-has-my-SendinBlue-account-not-been-validated-yet-
ðŸŽ¥ How can I get my SendinBlue SMTP account activated?
In order to activate your SendinBlue SMTP account, please send us an email requesting your account activation and include a note about the type of content you would like to send in your messages (m...
ðŸŽ¥ Why has my SendinBlue account not been validated yet?
This article is for users who want to send mass marketing campaigns by email or SMS (e.g. newsletters). If you just want to send transactional emails or SMS and your SMTP account has not been activ...
Thanks.
Looks like we need to request that our account is validated. Hope that does not take long.

Once you have completed these three steps, validation of your account will begin. An account manager will validate your account and give you full access to SendinBlue within a maximum of 24 working hours. Once your account has been validated, you should reschedule your campaign.
Ouch. Looks like we might not get this sent until tomorrow.
Are you sure that hasn't been done yet?
Nope. I'm not sure of anything. Just trying to figure it out now.
I think that my attempt to start a campaign might have triggered the authorization process on it's own.

OK, @jenlampton paid for a month of sendinblue and they sent our first 300 emails (did anyone get one)? But, now, when I try to send the rest, I am getting:

Sendinblue_Dashboard.png
Ugh, when did sending emails become so difficult?
I can look into that if you can help me with ZUlip

I think these are the relevant instructions: https://help.sendinblue.com/hc/en-us/articles/208848209-How-to-customize-your-DKIM-signature

How to customize your DKIM signature
With Sendinblue, you can customize your senders' DKIM signature with your domain name, whether your campaigns are sent via Sendinblue shared IP addresses or via dedicated IP addresses. To do this, ...
They also cover SPF and DMARC.
I did all the things on https://account.sendinblue.com/senders
I received the newsletter at 3:22 AM Pacific time.
